agentData.mission: Implement a single output-path helper utility (default OUTPUT_DIR = ./outputs, overrideable via environment variable) and refactor all writer modules to use this helper for determining output locations. Add a pytest that scans logs and produced artifact paths to assert that no absolute paths containing "/outputs" remain (only relative paths or paths derived from the helper are allowed). Ensure changes are well-documented and include a short usage note for the helper.
